${ModID}:MakeshiftSword.NAME: Makeshift Sword
${ModID}:MakeshiftSword.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is created during combat, gain !M! Vigor.

${ModID}:MakeshiftShield.NAME: Makeshift Shield
${ModID}:MakeshiftShield.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is created during combat, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:PaintBrush.NAME: Paint Brush
${ModID}:PaintBrush.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Discover a{!Upgrades!|>0=n upgraded} card with selected type and cost.

${ModID}:Firewall.NAME: Firewall
${ModID}:Firewall.DESCRIPTION: {@@}{!Upgrades!|>0=Innate. NL }When a Status card is created, NL Exhaust it.

${ModID}:Souvenirs.NAME: Souvenirs
${ModID}:Souvenirs.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Create an *Insight, *Smite or *Safety in hand. It draws a card. {!Upgrades!|>0= NL Do it again.}

${ModID}:Mimicry.NAME: Mimicry
${ModID}:Mimicry.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Discover a{!Upgrades!|>0=n upgraded} common card from other Packs you've selected.

${ModID}:CraftyMove.NAME: Crafty Move
${ModID}:CraftyMove.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If a card has been created this turn, gain [E] and draw a card.

${ModID}:BarrierBeacon.NAME: Barrier Beacon
${ModID}:BarrierBeacon.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !B! Block, create a{!Upgrades!|>0=n upgraded} copy of this in hand. Exhaust.

${ModID}:StrikingStrike.NAME: Striking Strike
${ModID}:StrikingStrike.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL Discover a{!Upgrades!|>0=n upgraded} strike. It Exhausts when played and costs 0 this turn.

${ModID}:AccumulativeStrike.NAME: Accumulative Strike
${ModID}:AccumulativeStrike.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for ALL your {!Upgrades!|0= non-Status} created cards.
